metadata.title: CVE-2019-19919 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Versions of handlebars prior to 4.3.0 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution leading to Remote Code Execution. Templates may alter an Object's __proto__ and __defineGetter__ properties, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code through crafted payloads.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-19919` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

handlebars - 3:4.5.3-1
libjs-handlebars - 3:4.5.3-1
libjs-handlebars.runtime - 3:4.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-handlebars package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3:4.5.3-1').
